sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './MainWeather.css' const MainWeather = (props) => { const {weather} = props const toFahrenheit = (temp) => { const fah = (temp - 273.15) * 1.8 + 32 return Math.floor(fah) } return (

{weather.name}, {weather.sys.country}

{weather.weather[0].main}

{toFahrenheit(weather.main.temp)}°

{weather.weather[0].description}

Min: {toFahrenheit(weather.main.temp_min)}°

Max: {toFahrenheit(weather.main.temp_max)}°

) } export default MainWeather
